description: codecs/hevcdec/SoftHEVC.cpp in libstagefright in mediaserver in Android 6.0.1 before 2016-08-01 mishandles decoder errors, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (device hang or reboot) via a crafted media file, aka internal bug 28816956.
commit_title: SoftHEVC: Exit gracefully in case of decoder errors
commit_text: Exit for error in allocation and unsupported resolutions  Bug: 28816956

description: decoder/ih264d_api.c in mediaserver in Android 6.x before 2016-08-01 mishandles invalid PPS and SPS NAL units, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (device hang or reboot) via a crafted media file, aka internal bug 28835995.
commit_title: Decoder: Do not conceal slices with invalid SPS/PPS

description: The ih264d decoder in mediaserver in Android 6.x before 2016-08-01 does not initialize certain structure members, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (device hang or reboot) via a crafted media file, aka internal bug 29023649.
commit_title: Decoder: Initialize first_pb_nal_in_pic for error slices
commit_text: first_pb_nal_in_pic was uninitialized for error clips  Bug: 29023649

description: The ih264d decoder in mediaserver in Android 6.x before 2016-08-01 does not initialize certain structure members, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (device hang or reboot) via a crafted media file, aka internal bug 29023649.
commit_title: Decoder: Initialize first_pb_nal_in_pic for error slices
commit_text: first_pb_nal_in_pic was uninitialized for error clips  Bug: 29023649
